desc.zh-CN: 开源个人 AI 助手，运行在你自己的机器上，通过 WhatsApp/Telegram/Discord 等聊天应用交互。
desc.en-US: Open-source personal AI assistant that runs on your own machine, interacting via WhatsApp/Telegram/Discord and more.

jsComment.zh-CN: 2026 年最令人兴奋的开源 AI 项目，没有之一。
jsComment.en-US: The most exciting open-source AI project of 2026, bar none.

desc.zh-CN: OpenClaw 官方技能市场，下载社区创建的技能扩展你的 AI 助手能力。
desc.en-US: Official OpenClaw skill marketplace. Download community-created skills to extend your AI assistant.

jsComment.zh-CN: 技能生态是 OpenClaw 的灵魂，这里能找到各种神奇的扩展。
jsComment.en-US: The skill ecosystem is the soul of OpenClaw. Find all kinds of amazing extensions here.

desc.zh-CN: OpenClaw 核心代码仓库，开源、可 hack、可自托管。
desc.en-US: OpenClaw core repository. Open-source, hackable, self-hostable.

jsComment.zh-CN: 代码质量很高，社区活跃度惊人，值得 star 和 watch。
jsComment.en-US: High code quality, amazing community activity. Worth a star and watch.

desc.zh-CN: 通过 WhatsApp 与你的 AI 助手对话，支持 DM 和群聊。
desc.en-US: Chat with your AI assistant via WhatsApp. Supports DM and group chats.

desc.zh-CN: Telegram Bot 接入，支持消息、语音、文件交互。
desc.en-US: Telegram Bot integration with message, voice, and file support.

desc.zh-CN: Discord 服务器中的 AI 助手，支持多频道管理。
desc.en-US: AI assistant in your Discord server with multi-channel management.

desc.zh-CN: 团队协作场景下的 AI 助手，集成到 Slack workspace。
desc.en-US: AI assistant for team collaboration, integrated into Slack workspace.

desc.zh-CN: 注重隐私的消息通道，端到端加密的 AI 对话。
desc.en-US: Privacy-focused messaging channel with end-to-end encrypted AI conversations.

desc.zh-CN: Apple 生态下的原生消息集成。
desc.en-US: Native messaging integration within the Apple ecosystem.

desc.zh-CN: OpenClaw 默认推荐模型，强大的推理和工具调用能力。
desc.en-US: OpenClaw's recommended default model with powerful reasoning and tool-calling.

desc.zh-CN: 支持 GPT-4o 等 OpenAI 模型作为后端驱动。
desc.en-US: Supports GPT-4o and other OpenAI models as backend drivers.

desc.zh-CN: 社区推荐的高性价比本地模型，工具调用表现优秀。
desc.en-US: Community-recommended cost-effective model with excellent tool-calling.

desc.zh-CN: 通过 Ollama 等工具运行本地模型，数据完全私有。
desc.en-US: Run local models via Ollama and similar tools. Fully private data.

desc.zh-CN: 邮件管理、自动回复、收件箱清理、退订管理。
desc.en-US: Email management, auto-reply, inbox cleanup, and unsubscribe management.

desc.zh-CN: 日程管理、提醒、自动安排会议。
desc.en-US: Schedule management, reminders, and automatic meeting scheduling.

desc.zh-CN: 连接你的知识库，让 AI 助手了解你的笔记。
desc.en-US: Connect your knowledge base so AI can understand your notes.

desc.zh-CN: 代码审查、Issue 管理、PR 创建与自动化。
desc.en-US: Code review, issue management, PR creation and automation.

desc.zh-CN: 任务管理自动化，通过对话创建和管理待办事项。
desc.en-US: Task management automation. Create and manage todos via conversation.

desc.zh-CN: 自动浏览网页、填写表单、提取数据，完整的浏览器自动化。
desc.en-US: Auto-browse pages, fill forms, extract data. Full browser automation.

desc.zh-CN: 读写文件、运行脚本、执行 shell 命令。
desc.en-US: Read/write files, run scripts, execute shell commands.

desc.zh-CN: 设置定时任务，让 AI 助手在特定时间自动执行工作。
desc.en-US: Set up scheduled tasks for your AI assistant to run automatically.

desc.zh-CN: AI 助手主动检查和汇报，不只是被动响应。
desc.en-US: AI assistant proactively checks and reports, not just reactive.

desc.zh-CN: 音乐控制、播放列表管理、歌曲推荐。
desc.en-US: Music control, playlist management, and song recommendations.

desc.zh-CN: AI 语音合成，让你的助手能打电话、发语音消息。
desc.en-US: AI voice synthesis. Let your assistant make calls and send voice messages.

desc.zh-CN: 通过对话生成视频，社区已实现完整工作流。
desc.en-US: Generate videos via conversation. Community has built full workflows.

desc.zh-CN: 最推荐的部署方案，24/7 运行的个人 AI 服务器。
desc.en-US: Most recommended deployment. 24/7 personal AI server.

desc.zh-CN: 低成本部署方案，搭配 Cloudflare 隧道实现外网访问。
desc.en-US: Low-cost deployment with Cloudflare tunnel for external access.

desc.zh-CN: 官方桌面客户端（Beta），菜单栏快速访问。
desc.en-US: Official desktop client (Beta). Quick access from menu bar.

desc.zh-CN: npm i -g openclaw，最简单的安装方式。
desc.en-US: npm i -g openclaw — the simplest way to install.

text.zh-CN: OpenClaw 是 2026 年最让人兴奋的开源项目。一个人 + 一个仓库，填补了价值数十亿美元的产业空白。
text.en-US: OpenClaw is the most exciting open-source project of 2026. One person + one repo, filling a multi-billion dollar industry gap.

text.zh-CN: 技能系统的设计太聪明了——AI 不仅能使用技能，还能自己编写新技能。这才是真正的可扩展性。
text.en-US: The skill system design is brilliant — AI can not only use skills but also write new ones. That's true extensibility.

text.zh-CN: 在 Mac Mini 上 24/7 运行 OpenClaw，感觉像拥有了一个不需要工资的全职助手。每天早晨的自动简报令人惊艳。
text.en-US: Running OpenClaw 24/7 on a Mac Mini feels like having a full-time assistant that doesn't need a salary. The daily morning briefing is amazing.

text.zh-CN: 社区的创造力超出想象：有人让它管理空气净化器，有人让它自动退订垃圾邮件，还有人让它用澳洲口音打电话。
text.en-US: Community creativity is beyond imagination: some control air purifiers, some auto-unsubscribe spam, some even make calls with an Australian accent.
